name: Tim-Hortons
address: Unit No 2 & 3, Ground Level , Supreme Headquarters, 14Th & 33Rd Road, Near Link Square Mall, Bandra West, Mumbai, Mumbai
description: Tim Hortons is a popular Canadian fast food restaurant chain. It is known for its coffee, doughnuts, and other baked goods. The menu also includes breakfast sandwiches, soups, salads, and wraps. The restaurant also offers a variety of specialty drinks, such as cappuccinos, lattes, and iced coffees. The atmosphere is casual and inviting, with a focus on providing a comfortable and enjoyable dining experience. The restaurant is also known for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always willing to help customers with their orders. Tim Hortons is a great place to grab a quick bite or to sit down and enjoy a meal with friends and family.
